rows.label: tev001593_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh. It's [ST:playername ].
Were you just listening in on that conversation?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_JNK0010
rows.name: Deny[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell the Murderess that you didn't hear a thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_JNK0020
rows.name: Assume[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if it was about a new money-making scheme.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0008
rows.name:
Oh, you didn't hear? What a bother.
Now I have to explain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0009
rows.name:
No no, I don't mind if you hear this.
This is a proper, legitimate, money-making venture.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0011
rows.name:
Exactly right. I don't mind if you overheard,
but I do hope you were the only one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0013
rows.name:
Once the Lifehold Core is secured, they'll finish building
New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0014
rows.name:
When the city is complete, its economy will be many
times the size of what it is now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0015
rows.name:
Businesses that are primarily being supported by the
government now will be able to become independent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0016
rows.name:
It'll be the dawn of a new era of competition and
free enterprise like back on Earth. And that means a
chance for people of wit and vision to strike it rich![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0017
rows.name:
Surely you wouldn't allow a business opportunity
like this to pass you by?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask the Murderess how exactly she intends to invest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_JNK0040
rows.name: Advise[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_SEL0041
rows.name:
Warn the Murderess that she could
be wiped out if her venture fails.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0023
rows.name:
There's so much miranium on this planet that we'll
never be able to mine it all, which means it has only
limited value as an investment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0024
rows.name:
Also, as the population increases, we're going to run
low on places for people to live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0025
rows.name: And that will put a strain on New LA's energy supply.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0026
rows.name:
The food supply could become an issue, too. We're in
mimeosomes now, but when we return to our real
bodies, will we be able keep eating the same things?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0027
rows.name:
If you think about all that, it should be obvious what
the most profitable investments will be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0028
rows.name:
I'm going to go for it. I'll make all my dreams come
true in one fell swoop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0029
rows.name: I may need your help from time to time, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0032
rows.name:
Yes, I'm well aware. But thank you for the grim
prediction of things to come.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0033
rows.name:
But I won't rest until the day I make my dream come
true. If that entails risk, so be it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001593_MSG0034
rows.name:
You be careful too, hmm? You don't want to fall for
any stories that sound too good to be true.[ST:wait ]
